functions.name: atomic_is_lock_free
functions.description: Checks if a type is lock-free for atomic operations.

functions.name: atomic_store
functions.description: Stores a value into an atomic object.

functions.name: atomic_load
functions.description: Loads a value from an atomic object.

functions.name: atomic_exchange
functions.description: Exchanges the value of an atomic object.

functions.name: atomic_compare_exchange_weak
functions.description: Compares and exchanges the value of an atomic object (weak version).

functions.name: atomic_compare_exchange_strong
functions.description: Compares and exchanges the value of an atomic object (strong version).

functions.name: atomic_fetch_add
functions.description: Adds a value to the atomic object and returns the previous value (fetch-and-add).

functions.name: atomic_fetch_sub
functions.description: Subtracts a value from the atomic object and returns the previous value (fetch-and-subtract).

functions.name: atomic_fetch_and
functions.description: Performs a bitwise AND operation on the atomic object and returns the previous value (fetch-and-AND).

functions.name: atomic_fetch_or
functions.description: Performs a bitwise OR operation on the atomic object and returns the previous value (fetch-and-OR).

functions.name: atomic_fetch_xor
functions.description: Performs a bitwise XOR operation on the atomic object and returns the previous value (fetch-and-XOR).
